name: Angry Sniper
description:
You are a sniper working for the fbi. Your job is to eliminate bad guys and to rescue hostages. Remember to be extra cautious because you can fire only one bullet before you have to leave the area.

select type of bullet - 1,2,3,4 or left mouse button 

fire - right mouse button

game made by : Sanchezklub,nxtdoorman,Hoody
